mapper.delete: DELETE from saas_distr_out_detail where out_id = #{id} and enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId}
mapper.select: SELECT sdod.id, sdod.unit_price,sdod.tax_rate_id, sdod.tax_rate,sdod.notax_real_price,sdod.notax_real_price ,sdod.notax_real_amount,sdod.tax_amount from saas_distr_out_detail sdod INNER JOIN saas_distr_out sdo on sdod.out_id=sdo.id where sdod.goods_id=#{goodsId} and sdo.request_unit_id=#{enterpriseId} order by sdod.create_time desc limit 1
